title: I enjoy this game, it's fun, but I don't know if I can play it anymore.
body:
Levelling to 30 was a joy. Got there sometime last week, and I usually didn't do too badly in my games. But since hitting 30? I can't compete. I underperform, and I usually wouldn't mind. I'm not a very competitive person. I do try to win, but as long as I feel I've tried my best, I honestly don't mind if I win or lose. What I do mind is the sling of insults that consistently come my way. Being told that I'm r%%%%%ed, or that I should kill myself, or that I'm trash, hinders my enjoyment of what would otherwise be a very enjoyable game!

I don't know what I hope to get from making this post, other than just a bit of frustration off my chest.

replies.body:
I remember feeling that way once I hit 30 too. Play with your friends! Hopefully along the path to lvl30 you met some people you really enjoy playing with, win or lose :)
Make ample use of the Mute function my friend.
Also, dont play ranked until you have 400 normals wins.
This is a great suggestion, I rarely even play by myself because the game is just more fun with other people.

Sometimes you just have to mute them until you get better
Good luck :( id love to play with you sometime if that helps
its like that when they want to win, just mute them from the tab menu
Hit mute button, problem solved. QQ
